member.name: M:EPRO.Ciphers.v4.Substitutional.CI.Keyless.#ctor(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Create Case Insentive Cipher Class. Covers ONLY chars from 32 to 126. All output are CAPS

member.name: M:EPRO.Ciphers.v4.Substitutional.CI.Keyless.Encrypt(System.String)
member.summary: Encrypts data. NB: Data will be converted to UpperCase

member.name: M:EPRO.Ciphers.v4.Substitutional.CI.Keyless.Decrypt(System.String)
member.summary: Decrypts Text. Output will be in Upper case but INPUT is case sensitive

member.name: T:EPRO.Ciphers.v4.Substitutional.CI.Keyless
member.summary: Runs a Case InSensitive Substitutional Cipher and Produces Case Sensitive Cipher Text

member.name: M:EPRO.Ciphers.v4.Substitutional.CS.Keyless.#ctor(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Create Case Sentive Cipher Class. Covers ONLY chars from 0 to 495. UTF-8
